title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7603.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7603.1 - Policy

State Regulations

The Commission of Correction recognizes the need to provide
a mechanism by which the department may apply for a variance to the
requirements of this Chapter when situations exist or arise that would prevent
or alter the department's ability to meet a requirement as set forth in this

Chapter. The commission shall grant such variances only under certain
conditions when so doing will not jeopardize the safety, security or good order
of a correctional facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7603.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
